name: TRUMP ANTHOLOGY EPISODE 1: A LINK TO THE PAST
name_original: TRUMP ANTHOLOGY EPISODE 1: A LINK TO THE PAST
description:
In a far future dystopian society, where people who love each other can get married and everyone has healthcare,
one man has what it takes to stand up and say: No. More.

In the high towers of Gethsemane Castle the man known as Steve Bannon lies sleepless, unable to ignore what's happening to his country.
Bannondorf shall wake, and from that sleepless night gather the force of an army with one singular goal etched interminably in
their mind: Make America Great. Again.

Journey from the brightest stronghold of the alt-right to the darkest basements of Reddit. To the heights of a world not constrained by
censorship or fake news. Recruit the infantry. Defend historical statues. Injustice needs defeat. Injustice needs a villain.
Do you want to be that villain?

A culturally timely, politically incorrect, Unreal Engine 4, Hi-Fidelity, Perfect Video Perfect Audio powered RPG that explores what makes a person good.
And what makes a country great.


GAME FEATURES
-A Fast Paced JRPG-Inspired Battle System, Refined and Perfected by American Exceptionalism
-Original, Award Winning Soundtrack That Many People Are Saying is 'Better Than Undertale'
-Several Minutes of Professionally Recorded Voice Acting
-Lore Deeper Than the Pockets of Billionaire Globalist George Soros
-Beautiful Full HD 720p
Trump Anthology: Episode I: A Link to the Past Digital Deluxe GOTF Game of the Forever 'Puppetmaster' Edition includes:
  • Trump Anthology: Episode I: A Link to the Past
  • Digital DRM Free Album, "Laughing & Screaming 'Songs From and Inspired by the Game 'Trump Anthology Episode 1: A Link to the Past', Featuring the Hit Singles 'One ½ Winged Angel' & 'America (The Theme Song)'
  • 2 Exclusive Wallpapers

Languages Supported: AMERICAN
